Text: Oh my god Wintermute! You are an angel!
Tamefan de bästa jag hört på MYCKET länge!!

Total legend... some great tracks that are new to me too.

Been a Mode, Yazoo, Nitzer Ebb, Human League and others fan for 20 years plus now but theyve been compiled with such a great mix of lesser known (to me at least) tunes.

I now have 23 of these albums and a long listen in store for me!

Cheers
I just can't thank you enough for making this great compilation. One song after the other are great! Thanks!!!!!!

Having soon listened ISOTOP 1-21 I have to say your collections are awesome. I had some of the music before but most are new finds for me, thanks a lot for them. Gonna get the rest of ISOTOP collections too!
Thanks for excellent work putting this together. A lot of great remixes I haven't heard before! Thanks a million!
if anyone has de/vision's void, please upload it thanks.
Would love to see more compilations!
